attributes.action: congratulate  the Transport Secretary on his overdue proposal to create a forum for debate on national road congestion charging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Transport secretary wants debate. The Department of Transport's website points out that the feasability study was conducted with assistance from the AA, RAC and  Transport 2000 that various ideas are being discussed. More debate is needed not threats or unargued opinions.
